languages.text: "Я есть закон — и слежу за порядком в этой части {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}. А также на мирах протектората фон Валанциус, по старинным договоренностям с вашими предками. В моих силах дать просителям желаемое или покарать преступников за неисполнение воли Империума".

traits.locale_text: "Я есть закон — и слежу за порядком в этой части {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Коронуса{/g}. А также на мирах торговой империи фон Валанциус, по старинным договоренностям с вашими предками. В моих силах дать просителям желаемое или покарать преступников за неисполнение воли Империума".
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "I am the law — and I oversee order in this section of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. As well as on worlds of the von Valancius protectorate, in accordance with ancient covenants made with your ancestors. I hold the power to grant petitioners what they seek and to punish criminals for failing to carry out the Imperium's will."
languages.original_text: "Я есть закон — и слежу за порядком в этой части {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Простора{/g}. А также на мирах протектората фон Валанциус, по старинным договоренностям с вашими предками. В моих силах дать просителям желаемое или покарать преступников за неисполнение воли Империума".

I hold the power to grant petitioners what they seek and to punish criminals for failing to carry out the Imperium's will."

As well as on worlds of the von Valancius protectorate, in accordance with ancient covenants made with your ancestors. I hold the power to grant petitioners what they seek and to punish criminals for failing to carry out the Imperium's will."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: “我就是法律本身。我负责监督{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}这片区域的秩序。根据你的祖先签订的古老契约，我也同样负责监督冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的诸多世界。我有权力给予那些请愿者他们寻求的东西，也有权力惩处那些未能行使帝国意志的罪人。”
languages.original_text: "I am the law — and I oversee order in this section of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. As well as on worlds of the von Valancius protectorate, in accordance with ancient covenants made with your ancestors. I hold the power to grant petitioners what they seek and to punish criminals for failing to carry out the Imperium's will."

traits.locale_text: “我就是法律本身。我负责监督{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}科罗努斯扩区{/g}这片区域的秩序。根据你的祖先签订的古老契约，我也同样负责监督冯·瓦兰修斯王朝的诸多世界。我有权力给予那些请愿者他们寻求的东西，也有权力惩处那些未能行使帝国意志的罪人。”
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: «Yo soy la ley y superviso el orden en esta región de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, además de en los mundos del protectorado von Valancius como dictan unos antiguos pactos con sus antepasados. Tengo el poder de dar a los solicitantes lo que buscan y de castigar a los criminales por no seguir la voluntad del Imperium».
languages.original_text: "I am the law — and I oversee order in this section of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. As well as on worlds of the von Valancius protectorate, in accordance with ancient covenants made with your ancestors. I hold the power to grant petitioners what they seek and to punish criminals for failing to carry out the Imperium's will."

traits.locale_text: «Yo soy la ley y superviso el orden en esta región de la {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Extensión de Koronus{/g}, además de en los mundos del protectorado von Valancius como dictan unos antiguos pactos con sus antepasados. Tengo el poder de dar a los solicitantes lo que buscan y de castigar a los criminales por no seguir la voluntad del Imperium».
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: 「私が法なのです。そして{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}のこの星域における秩序を監視しています。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の保護領と同様に、陛下の祖先と結んだ古の協定に基づいた業務です。私には嘆願者の請求を承認するとともに、帝国の意思に従わない犯罪者を処罰する権限が与えられております」
languages.original_text: "I am the law — and I oversee order in this section of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. As well as on worlds of the von Valancius protectorate, in accordance with ancient covenants made with your ancestors. I hold the power to grant petitioners what they seek and to punish criminals for failing to carry out the Imperium's will."

traits.locale_text: 「私が法なのです。そして{g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}コロヌス・エクスパンス{/g}のこの星域における秩序を監視しています。フォン・ヴァランシウス王朝の保護領と同様に、陛下の祖先と結んだ古の協定に基づいた業務です。私には嘆願者の請求を承認するとともに、帝国の意思に従わない犯罪者を処罰する権限が与えられております」
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: « Je suis l'incarnation de la loi et je veille au maintien de l'ordre dans ce secteur des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, de même que sur les mondes dépendant du protectorat von Valancius, conformément aux anciens accords conclus avec vos ancêtres. Autrement dit, je détiens le pouvoir de donner satisfaction aux requérants et de punir les criminels qui osent enfreindre la volonté de l'Imperium. »
languages.original_text: "I am the law — and I oversee order in this section of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. As well as on worlds of the von Valancius protectorate, in accordance with ancient covenants made with your ancestors. I hold the power to grant petitioners what they seek and to punish criminals for failing to carry out the Imperium's will."

traits.locale_text: « Je suis l'incarnation de la loi et je veille au maintien de l'ordre dans ce secteur des {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Étendues de Koronus{/g}, de même que sur les mondes dépendant du protectorat von Valancius, conformément aux anciens accords conclus avec vos ancêtres. Autrement dit, je détiens le pouvoir de donner satisfaction aux requérants et de punir les criminels qui osent enfreindre la volonté de l'Imperium. »
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Ich bin das Gesetz – und ich überwache die Ordnung in diesem Abschnitt der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}. Und auch auf den Welten des Protektorats von Valancius, in Übereinkunft mit alten Verträgen, die mit Euren Ahnen abgeschlossen wurden. Ich besitze die Macht, Antragstellern ihr Anliegen zu gewähren und Kriminelle zu bestrafen, die sich dem Willen des Imperiums verweigert haben."
languages.original_text: "I am the law — and I oversee order in this section of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. As well as on worlds of the von Valancius protectorate, in accordance with ancient covenants made with your ancestors. I hold the power to grant petitioners what they seek and to punish criminals for failing to carry out the Imperium's will."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bin das Gesetz – und ich überwache die Ordnung in diesem Abschnitt der {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus-Ausdehnung{/g}. Und auch auf den Welten des Protektorats von Valancius, in Übereinkunft mit alten Verträgen, die mit Euren Ahnen abgeschlossen wurden. Ich besitze die Macht, Antragstellern ihr Anliegen zu gewähren und Kriminelle zu bestrafen, die sich dem Willen des Imperiums verweigert haben."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals

languages.text: "Ben kanunun ta kendisiyim... {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği'nin{/g} bu kısmında nizam benden sorulur. Atalarınızın yaptığı kadim antlaşmalar uyarınca von Valancius protektorasına dâhil olan dünyalar da hakeza. Müracaatçılara taleplerini bahşetme ve İmparatorluk'un iradesini çiğneyen suçluları cezalandırma gücüne sahibim."
languages.original_text: "I am the law — and I oversee order in this section of the {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Expanse{/g}. As well as on worlds of the von Valancius protectorate, in accordance with ancient covenants made with your ancestors. I hold the power to grant petitioners what they seek and to punish criminals for failing to carry out the Imperium's will."

traits.locale_text: "Ben kanunun ta kendisiyim... {g|Encyclopedia:KoronusExpanse}Koronus Enginliği{/g}'nin bu kısmında nizam benden sorulur. Atalarınızın yaptığı kadim antlaşmalar uyarınca von Valancius protektorasına dâhil olan dünyalar da hakeza. Müracaatçılara taleplerini bahşetme ve İmparatorluk'un iradesini çiğneyen suçluları cezalandırma gücüne sahibim."
traits.speaker: MasterOfSeals
